description.english: Finish the scenario 4A1 "Dive into the 4th dimension"
Finish the scenario 4A2 "Let's get up to speed"
Finish the scenario 4A4 "Speeding up for real"
Finish the scenario 4B1 "Who needs cells anyway?"
Finish the scenario 4A2-A "Let's get up to speed"
Finish the scenario 4A4-A "Speeding up for real"
Finish the scenario 4B1-A "Who needs cells anyway?"
Move one million steps in total.
Eat a total of 10 000 food items.
Gather a total accumulated score of 10 000 000 from Survivor Mode games
Get a score of 100 000 in one Survivor Mode game
Have a total game time of at least 24 hours
Grow to a length of at least 1000
Visit all cells in one game
Play all scenarios at least once (not including absolute scenarios)
Play all scenarios at least once (including absolute scenarios)
Get a score in all Survivor Modes
